'''Songs of the Forest''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Duration==
October 24, 2022 12:00:00 – October 31, 2022 23:59:59 (UTC+8)

==Event Summary==
During the duration, complete and share the event to get Primogems through redemption codes (limited to 3 million in quantity).
After obtaining a redemption code, you can use it to redeem the gift pack via Settings > Account > Redemption Code in the game.

==Event Rewards==
Primogems ×40 (limited to 3 million in quantity)

==Notes==
# Players must have an Adventure Rank of 10 and above to activate the gift pack, and each UID can only receive the pack once.
# The redemption code is valid until November 1, 2022 23:59:59 (UTC+8). Please claim it within the validity period.
(Note: We recommend Travelers to set your screen to portrait mode for a better experience.)
